title: Potato Chowder
directions: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until potatoes are tender.
Add cream cheese; stir until blended. Garnish with bacon and chives if desired. Yield: 12 servings (3 quarts).
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1/2 pound sliced Jones Dairy Farm Dry-Aged Bacon, cooked and crumbled, optional
